info.name: Centre pompidou - responsive css
info.description:
Pon-pon pidou.
An idea came from http://responsivemuseum.tumblr.com/ to rethink the css of a museum. So I did. Hope it helps you in your culture quest. Vandy Vincent
info.additionalInfo:
you can try it by copy pasting that in your url adress bar once you browsed the website 
(make sure "javascript" stays at the beginning of the line):

javascript: (function(){if (!document.getElementById('someuniqueid')){var objHead = document.getElementsByTagName('head'); if (objHead[0]){if (document.createElementNS && objHead[0].tagName == 'head') var objCSS = objHead[0].appendChild(document.createElementNS('http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml', 'link')); else var objCSS = objHead[0].appendChild(document.createElement('link')); objCSS.id = 'someuniqueid'; objCSS.rel = 'stylesheet'; objCSS.href = 'http://vincentvandy.be/ponpon_pidou.css'; objCSS.type ='text/css';}}})()
